18 * Top level parser interface. For use in the main program
19 * and in the main parser, but not in formatters.
20 */
21
22/*
23 * Parse options.
24 */
25#define MPARSE_MDOC (1 << 0) /* assume -mdoc */
26#define MPARSE_MAN (1 << 1) /* assume -man */
27#define MPARSE_SO (1 << 2) /* honour .so requests */
28#define MPARSE_QUICK (1 << 3) /* abort the parse early */
29#define MPARSE_UTF8 (1 << 4) /* accept UTF-8 input */
30#define MPARSE_LATIN1 (1 << 5) /* accept ISO-LATIN-1 input */
31#define MPARSE_VALIDATE (1 << 6) /* call validation functions */
32
33
34struct roff_meta;
35struct mparse;
36
37struct mparse *mparse_alloc(int, enum mandoc_os, const char *);
38void mparse_copy(const struct mparse *);
39void mparse_free(struct mparse *);
40int mparse_open(struct mparse *, const char *);
41void mparse_readfd(struct mparse *, int, const char *);
42void mparse_reset(struct mparse *);
43struct roff_meta *mparse_result(struct mparse *);
44
